creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: Meiji-period reproduction without artist's seal and cutter and printer marks
inscription:
Poem by Seiyôkan Umeyo: {Harugasumi/ hikishi gyôji no/ uchiwa yori/ kachidoki agete/ isamu niwatori}
Poem by Hokueishi Sutena: {Ashigara no/ yama no hatsuhi ni/ iro-akaki/ Kasumi Otoko wa/ ima mo komoreri}
medium: Woodblock print (surimono); ink and color on paper
title: No. 1 (Kintarô Referees a Match between a Rooster and a Tengu)
